question: If a cube is painted on all six faces and then cut into 64 smaller cubes of equal size, how many of the smaller cubes will have exactly one face painted?
Which of the following 3D shapes can be unfolded into a cross-shaped net?
A piece of paper is folded in half three times. If a single straight cut is made through all the layers and the paper is then unfolded, how many separate pieces will there be?
